name: creamy mac and cheese with bacon
instructions: 1. Cook the macaroni according to the package instructions. Drain and set aside.
2. In a skillet, cook the bacon until crispy. Remove from the skillet and crumble into small pieces. Set aside.
3. In the same skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the flour and whisk constantly for 1 minute until well combined.
4. Slowly pour in the milk while whisking continuously to prevent lumps. Cook the mixture for 3-4 minutes until it thickens.
5. Reduce heat to low and stir in the shredded cheddar cheese until melted and smooth.
6. Add the cooked macaroni to the cheese sauce and stir well to coat evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the creamy mac and cheese in a bowl or plate, and sprinkle the crumbled bacon on top.
description: Creamy mac and cheese with bacon is a classic comfort food dish that combines tender macaroni noodles coated in a rich and cheesy sauce. The addition of crispy bacon lends a smoky and savory flavor, making it an irresistible dish for cheese and bacon lovers.
